components.description: Executes a given subflow within the current flow. The subflow shares the same context of the calling flow. When completed the result Message of its execution is sent back to the original flow continuing its execution.

properties.name: ref
properties.description: The id of the referenced subflow

components.description: The For Each component applies to each element of the input collection the components following the for each processor. A Join component can be added right outside the scope of the For Each to merge together all the results. If no Join component is present all the results after the execution are collected in a list.

The Fork component copies the current flow message and sends each copy to every branch following the component. The execution of each branch is performed in parallel and the resulting messages from each execution can be merged by adding a Join component right after the fork scope. If the fork scope is not followed by any branch an empty flow message is set instead.

A router component allows to execute only one of the branches following the component based on a given condition which must be defined for each branch. A default condition is mandatory, which represents the default branch to be executed when no other condition is met. A condition might be a function checking the content of the payload or the presence (or absence) of a specific attribute in the message and so on.

properties.name: conditionAndRouteDefinitions
properties.description: For each route a dynamic value returning a boolean value must be specified. Each dynamic value is evaluated for each branch of the router to determine which branch has to be executed.

components.description: Allows to execute a sequence of components in the try branch and perform another sequence of components in the catch branch whenever an error is thrown by the execution of the components in the try.

types.description: The Error type encapsulates an error.

functions.name: getMessage
functions.description: Returns the error message.

functions.name: toString
functions.description: Returns a string representation of the error.

types.description: The FlowContext type encapsulates the execution context for a flow. The execution context allows to store and retrieve data which can be accessed by components during the execution of a flow. For example the correlation id which is a unique identifier generated every time a flow is executed.

functions.name: contains
functions.description: Checks whether an object with the given key exists in the context.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Retrieves the object stored in the context given the key.

functions.name: put
functions.description: Puts an object with the given key into the flow context.

functions.name: toString
functions.description: Returns a string representation of the flow context.

properties.name: correlationId
properties.description: Returns the current flow correlation id.

types.description: The Message encapsulates data and attributes passing through the components of a flow.

functions.name: payload
functions.description: Returns the payload (data) of the message. The payload could be a text, a byte array, a collection and so on depending on the component which generated it.

functions.name: content
functions.description: Returns the content descriptor of this message. The message content contains information about the payload's mime type, data type and stream status.

functions.name: attributes
functions.description: Returns the message attributes belonging to this message.

types.description: The message attributes type contains attributes set by processors in the out message after their execution. Message attributes contain information collected during the execution of a given component. For example, the REST Listener sets in the attributes request's path parameters, query parameters, HTTP headers and so on.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Given the attribute key, returns the attribute value associated with the given key.

functions.name: contains
functions.description: If exists an attribute in the message attributes with the given key, returns true, false otherwise.

properties.name: component
properties.description: The name of the component setting the attributes.

types.description: An attachment encapsulates an HTTP multipart form data object or an email attachment.

functions.name: name
functions.description: Returns the name of the attachment.

functions.name: payload
functions.description: Returns the payload of the attachment.

functions.name: getPayload
functions.description: Returns the payload of the attachment.

functions.name: content
functions.description: Returns the content of the attachment.

functions.name: attributes
functions.description: Returns the attributes of the attachment.

types.description: The DataRow type encapsulates a generic data row. Such as a database row, a csv document row and so on.

functions.name: columnCount
functions.description: Returns the number of columns in this row.

functions.name: getColumnCount
functions.description: Returns the number of columns in this row.

functions.name: columnName
functions.description: Given the column index, returns the column name at the given index.

functions.name: getColumnName
functions.description: Given the column index, returns the column name at the given index.

functions.name: columnNames
functions.description: Returns a list containing all column names of this data row.

functions.name: getColumnNames
functions.description: Returns a list containing all column names of this data row.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Given the column index, returns the value of the row at the given index.

functions.name: getByColumnName
functions.description: Given the column name, returns the value of the row from the given column name.

functions.name: getValues
functions.description: Returns a list containing all the values belonging to this row.

functions.name: values
functions.description: Returns a list containing all the values belonging to this row.

functions.name: getAttributes
functions.description: Returns the attributes of this row such as the column types for a Database data row.

functions.name: attributes
functions.description: Returns the attributes of this row such as the column types for a Database data row.

functions.name: getAttribute
functions.description: Returns a single attribute of this row such as the column types for a Database data row.

functions.name: attribute
functions.description: Returns a single attribute of this row such as the column types for a Database data row.

functions.name: asMap
functions.description: Returns this data row as map. The map keys are the column names and map values are the values corresponding to the mapped column name.

types.description: A mime type encapsulates information about the mime type of the content. A mime type is composed by a primary type (e.g image) and by a sub type (e.g jpeg).

functions.name: subType
functions.description: Returns the sub-type of the mime type.

functions.name: primaryType
functions.description: Returns the primary type of the mime type.

functions.name: fileExtensions
functions.description: Returns a list of file extensions associated to this mime type.

types.description: A typed content contains information about the payload which encapsulates. Information provided by type are payload type (e.g String, Object, Collection), mime type (e.g text/plain, image/jpeg), and the actual content data.

functions.name: type
functions.description: Returns the data type of the content.

functions.name: streamType
functions.description: Returns the data type of the stream generated by this content.

functions.name: mimeType
functions.description: Returns the mime type of the content.

functions.name: data
functions.description: Returns the actual data which could be could be a text, a byte array, a collection and so on depending on the component which generated it.

functions.name: isStream
functions.description: Returns true if this message is a stream, false otherwise.

functions.name: consume
functions.description: Consumes the stream of this message by loading the entire stream content in memory.
